title: Food2You
description: Food delivery App based on user position with dynamic status of the rider on the map.

title: Weather App
description: Real time Weather App with the possibility of chosing a desired location and see 4 days forecast with beautiful animations and background images

title: iOS Clone
description: iOS Clone fully working, with drag, swipe and touch event listeners, real time stocks app, camera fully working with the possibility of capturing photos that automatically are saved on the gallery and other more.

title: HangMan Game
description: The Classic hangman game fully responsive and bilingual (IT/EN)

title: Tombola!
description: The best winter's holiday game, now fully responsive and with the possibility of printing cards for playing at home

title: Monkey Form!
description: A simple and funny login form fully customizable, it provides built in submit function and a funny monkey animation on show/hide password checkbox with monkey covering his eyes.

title: Roulette of Names
description: If you're going to make a decision and you don't know what to choose, use this App! You can add as much entries as you want, customizable colors and winner announcement. Fully responsive!

title: Memory Game
description: The classic memory game for all ages, train your brain with this intuitive game made for 2 players fully responsive

title: Codice fiscale IT calculator
description: Calculate your Italian Tax ID code, or retrieve your data inversely

title: Calculator App
description: A simple calculator app with a beautiful design
